special_text:
Transcend [i](Activate as a sorcery to gain the next type and a +1/+1 counter.)[/i]
Whenever Daemthine enters or transcends, each opponent creates a 1/1 colorless Fan creature token with deathtouch.
{2}{W}: Performer
Until end of turn, creatures you don't control can't block unless their controller pays {1} for each blocking creature.
{5}{R}: Elder
Daemthine deals 13 damage to each creature and planeswalker you don't control.
